NetSparkleUpdater.​UpdateInfo
public
NetSparkleUpdater.​UpdateInfo

A simple class to hold information on potential updates to a software product.

Functions
UpdateInfo
public UpdateInfo(
UpdateStatus status
)

Create information about an update with the given status and no available update items

Parameter
status
UpdateStatus

Information on whether an update is available

UpdateInfo
public UpdateInfo(
UpdateStatus status,
List<AppCastItem> updates
)

Create information about an update with the given status and update items

Parameters
status
UpdateStatus

Information on whether an update is available

updates
List<AppCastItem>

The list of updates that are available to update to

Properties
Status
public UpdateStatus Status { get; set }

Whether or not an update is available

Updates
public List<AppCastItem> Updates { get; set }

Any available updates for the product that the user could potentially install
